text: M is the 13th letter in the English alphabet. == Meanings for M == * In calendars, M sometimes means Monday or means one of the months "March" or "May". * In money, M means million, such as $25M (twenty-five million dollars). * In the SI, m is the symbol for the metre. * In Roman numerals, M means one thousand. * M is also the name of a 1930 German movie made by Fritz Lang and its 1951 remake. ==Other websites==
title: M
